Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the central area of Market Circle

The central area of Market Circle is a chaotic array of multi-hued pavilions, awnings, canopies and wooden stalls loosely arranged around a sunken circular plaza covered in tiny, colorful mosaic tiles. The intricate tiles of the mosaic create an image of a compass with stylized letters representing the four cardinal directions. The center of the circular mosaic features four animal heads in profile, each one positioned near the corresponding direction as a visual representation of the four Great Houses. Underneath the colorful coverings are barrels, crates, wagons, tables and carts holding a myriad of different wares. Larger wagons drift north and south along the western periphery in almost continual traffic, each on piled high with import and export goods. In the distance to the northwest, the grand Cathedral de Temoin stands in shining white grandeur against the backdrop of the wall that surrounds the city while in the opposite direction is Newtown Bank. To the south, the aqueducts stand several stories high, separating northern Newtown from its southern counterpart. A large canvas tent known as the Grand Pavilion stands to the northwest, while the remainder of the plaza spreads out in every other direction. The controlled chaos of the market fills the area with constant noise as vendors cry out for attention among the bustling bodies.Though night has fallen, intrepid vendors still hawk their wares amid the sputtering light of oil lanterns.

The central area of Market Circle is a chaotic array of pavilions, awnings, canopies and wooden stalls loosely arranged around a sunken circular plaza covered in mosaic tiles. Underneath these coverings are tables, barrels, crates, wagons and carts holding a myriad of different wares. A large canvas tent known as the Grand Pavilion stands to the northwest, while the remainder of the plaza spreads out in every other direction. The controlled chaos of the market fills the area with constant noise as vendors cry out for attention among the bustling bodies.Though night has fallen, intrepid vendors still hawk their wares amid the sputtering light of oil lanterns.

To the south, the aqueducts stand several stories high, separating northern Newtown from its southern counterpart. A large canvas tent known as the Grand Pavilion stands to the northwest, while the remainder of the plaza spreads out in every other direction. the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-north:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-north:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-north:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]

To the $[($this."details:exit-north:exit:directions"[0])] is the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-north:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-north:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-north:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]. From here, you can see:

the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]

To the $[($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:directions"[0])] is the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-northeast:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]. From here, you can see:
the Grand Pavilion

Constructed of cream-colored canvas, this large, peaked pavilion stands prominently to the northwest. The flaps have been tied open to allow entrance to the space inside, allowing a glimpse of the well-lit interior cluttered with colorful wares.

the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-south:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-south:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-south:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]

To the $[($this."details:exit-south:exit:directions"[0])] is the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-south:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-south:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-south:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]. From here, you can see:

the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]

To the $[($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:directions"[0])] is the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-southeast:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]. From here, you can see:

the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]

To the $[($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:directions"[0])] is the $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:streetportion"] portion of $[NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:streetname"] $[capitalize(NRefOb($this."details:exit-southwest:exit:dest")."trait:streettype")]. From here, you can see:
navy blue pinstriped pavilion
To the eastern side of Market Circle is a three sided fabric pavilion crafted from navy blue pinstriped fabric supported by thin steel rods.
circular plaza

The center of the space is dominated by a large sunken circle covered entirely in tiny mosaic tiles arranged to create the image of a large compass surrounding images that represent the four Great Houses. These animal head profiles are situated near the cardinal directions representative of their respective geographical locations. A singular step surrounds this circle.
variegated green leather awning
Strung between two lamp posts and propped up by angled wooden rods, this variegated green leather awning stands to the north and provides protection from the elements.
softly sputtering oil lantern hanging from a post
Suspended from black iron lamp posts, the oil lanterns provide adequate lighting for the market during the night.
intricate mosaic

Covering the circular plaza are thousands of tiny tiles intricately arranged to create a detailed image. The outer edge of the circular mosaic is comprised of a large compass with stylized cursive letters at the four cardinal directions. The interior of the circle displays four animal heads in profile, representing the four Great Houses. Near the northern part of the compass image is a boar with capped white tusks in profile, detailed with tiny tiles in shades of green. To the east of this is a profile of a horse with a flowing mane, the artwork created with tiles in various blue colors. The western portion of the mosaic is comprised of a howling wolf, the fur detailed with variegated red tiles. And finally, to the south is a slightly larger profile of a fox created with purple shades of tile which are overlaid atop the image a large porcelain colored seashell.
dark violet-colored canopy
Strung between three weighted posts, this triangular oiled cloth is dyed a dark violet color and provides protection from the elements in the southern portion of central Market Circle.
red cedar market stall
This covered stall is situated to the west provides a safe place to sell wares, the support beams, half walls and roof all crafted from cedar wood and stained a dark red hue.
the step
A single step that surrounds Market Circle and descends into the central area.
A single step that surrounds Market Circle and descends into the central area.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ You here a \{ faint coughing \| groaning \| soft cry \} from somewhere in the distance. \| A large group of \{ horses \| boars \| foxes \| wolves \| cats \| dogs\} burst through the area, dragging trunks, bags and wagons full of items as they rush northward through the area. \| A harried looking mother with tear-stained cheeks drags two young children through the area, hurrying northward before disappearing into the distance. \| A group of priests rush through the area, praying fervently as they hold handkerchiefs over their mouths. \| A young \{ fox \| wolf \| boar \| horse \| dog \} doubles-over in a fit of coughing. \| A group of constables wearing heavy leather hoods march through the area, scanning the area warily as they patrol. \| A \{ brown-and-black mutt \| tall silver-grey horse \| stocky auburn fox \| brawny storm grey wolf \| bulky black boar \} briefly doubles over in a fit of coughing. \| A \{ brown-and-black mutt \| tall silver-grey horse \| stocky auburn fox \| brawny storm grey wolf \| bulky black boar \} wipes his brow before exhaling a wheezing sigh. \| With a pained groan, a \{ brown-and-black mutt \| tall silver-grey horse \| stocky auburn fox \| brawny storm grey wolf \| bulky black boar \} gasps for air before coughing into his hands. \| A \{ slim toned fox \| curvy cream-white sow \} grimaces in pain, stifling a cough with a soft grunt. \| Losing her balance for a moment, a \{ slim toned fox \| curvy cream-white sow \} grabs hold of a nearby lamp while coughing. \| Wheezing with a thick pained sound, a \{ slim toned fox \| curvy cream-white sow \} shakily wipes the sweat from her brow. \| A large caravan of \{ horses \| boars \| wolves \| foxes \| cats \| dogs \| weasels \} slowly plods through the area, hauling sacks and satchels laden with goods as they proceed toward the north. \| The faint smell of burning flesh and fur wafts through the air on a breeze. \| In the distance, the sound of breaking glass can be heard. \| A group of \{ rats \| weasels \| cats \} dressed in black run through the room, carrying armloads of shiny metal home decor items. \| A group of priests wander lostly through the area, aimlessly sprinkling Holy Water around. \}
